en: 1. File name does not need to be added. (.btl)

keys: 2.保留军团仅会保留被截取地块上有的军团(根据省规划计算)
en: 2. Keep the legion only retaining some legions on the intercepted plot. (calculated according to the provincial planning)

keys: 3.保留军队,城市等依赖地块的单位仅会保留被截取地块部份上的单位。
en: 3. Retaining units such as armies and cities that depend on land parcels will only retain the units on the intercepted land parcels.

keys: 4.所有拥有依赖国家单位数据的单位(列如空中支援里的军团数据),在保留国家后且还存在这个军团才会保留。
en: 4. All units with data that rely on national units (such as legion data in air support) will be retained after the country is retained and the legion still exists.
